item.description:
Come check out the new Dark Sun campaign material being released for D&D 4.0. Copies of the new Dark Sun Campaign Guide, featuring new character options and background, and two new races (mul and Thri-kreen). and the Dark Sun Creature Catalog will be available for people to look at. Refreshments and light snacks will be served.
We'll also be running the Game Day adventure The Lost Cistern of Aravek A forth level adventure where the characters are trying to bring a remarkable device back to the city state of Tyr. First session will start at 1PM and if we have enough interest we'll run a second session at 6PM.
We'll also have the new D&D: Essentials for players to review, and we might do a demo if players are interested.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Dark Sun Game Day Meetup at Toys N Things
